Methods

errors()

Initialize the plugin. Waits until the player is ready to do anything.

Source:
  • index.js, line 276

initPlugin()

Monitors a player for signs of life during playback and triggers PLAYER_ERR_TIMEOUT if none occur within a reasonable timeframe.

Source:
  • index.js, line 73
